solution_line_template: There are {num_girls}+{num_boys} = <<{num_girls}+{num_boys}={total_students}>>{total_students} students in the class
{total_books} books were divided equally among them for a total of {total_books}/{total_students} = <<{total_books}/{total_students}={books_per_student}>>{books_per_student} books each
{num_girls} girls will get a total of {num_girls}*{books_per_student} = <<{num_girls}*{books_per_student}={total_books_for_girls}>>{total_books_for_girls} books
